files.patch:
@@ -365,1 +365,4 @@
-  st->print("|BTE " INTPTR_FORMAT_H_W(12) ", " INTPTR_FORMAT_H_W(12) ", " INTPTR_FORMAT_H_W(12),
+
+#define SHR_PTR_FORMAT "%12" PRIxPTR
+
+  st->print("|BTE " SHR_PTR_FORMAT  ", " SHR_PTR_FORMAT ", " SHR_PTR_FORMAT,
@@ -367,1 +370,1 @@
-  st->print("|TAMS " INTPTR_FORMAT_H_W(12),
+  st->print("|TAMS " SHR_PTR_FORMAT,
@@ -369,1 +372,1 @@
-  st->print("|UWM " INTPTR_FORMAT_H_W(12),
+  st->print("|UWM " SHR_PTR_FORMAT,
@@ -378,0 +381,2 @@
+
+#undef SHR_PTR_FORMAT
